clinical_study.brief_title: CT-2106 for the Second Line Treatment of Ovarian Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Open Label Study of CT-2106 as a Single Agent in Patients With Advanced Metastatic Ovarian Cancer Who Have Failed One Prior Platinum and Taxane Based Regimen

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this sudy is to determine the response rate of CT-2106 in patients with advanced ovarian cancer who have failed one prior platinum and taxane based regimen.
